title: What you see is what you get!
description:
Introduction

HackerEarth has grown into a platform that serves a huge number of customers for technical assessment. To make this possible, we try our best to make the platform as easy-to-use as it can get.

At several places in our Recruiter Dashboard, we used to have a Markdown editor to allow users to edit free text. There have been multiple times when many of our recruiters have struggled to create content using the Markdown editor. They need not to worry anymore. After many such requests to improve this, we came up with a fix. Say hello to CKEditor (version 4)â€”The well-known WYSIWYG, Rich Text editor.
